str2: From hos with the directive enclitic of source; from which place or source or cause.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
First, before, principal, most important. Contracted superlative of pro; foremost.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To consecrate, dedicate, renovate. From egkainia; to renew, i.e. Inaugurate.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
